thread.title: BRIEF-Energy Recovery Awarded $10.1 Million For Water Projects In Saudi Arabia

title: BRIEF-Energy Recovery Awarded $10.1 Million For Water Projects In Saudi Arabia
text: March 27, 2018 / 1:08 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Energy Recovery Awarded $10.1 Million For Water Projects In Saudi Arabia Reuters Staff March 27 (Reuters) - Energy Recovery Inc: * ENERGY RECOVERY AWARDED $10.1 MILLION FOR WATER PROJECTS IN SAUDI ARABIA * ENERGY RECOVERY - ANNOUNCED TOTAL AWARDS OF $10.1 MILLION TO SUPPLY ITS PX PRESSURE EXCHANGER, & PUMP TECHNOLOGIES FOR WATER PROJECTS IN SAUDI ARABIA * ENERGY RECOVERY INC - ORDERS ARE EXPECTED TO SHIP IN SECOND AND THIRD QUARTERS OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
